articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Accuses Park Geun Hye of Turning S. Korea into Veritable Hell
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Accuses Park Geun Hye of Turning S. Korea into Veritable Hell
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a white paper Monday accusing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea of the unheard-of hideous fascist suppression it has committed since it took power.
					 The white paper says:
					
					 Park Geun Hye worked overtly and covertly to eliminate from the political arena the Unified Progressive Party, which set it as its programme to achieve independence, democracy and reunification, after labeling it as an "unconstitutional pro-north political party." When she found it hard to carry out her sinister design, being faced with torrential public criticism, she cooked up a conspiratorial plotted rebellion case to finally dissolve the party, which had conducted legitimate activities for 15 years, in December, 2014.
					
					 Not content with harshly suppressing the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) founded in 1989, she, terming it the "heart of followers of the north", "enemy inside south Korea", finally outlawed the union by labeling it as an "organization benefiting the enemy."
					
					 The Park group let gangsters storm and illegally search the office and houses of members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in broad daylight, confiscate their personal belongings, arrest its core member on his sickbed and impose all mental and physical sufferings on its secretary general by dragging him here and there with his hands cuffed.
					
					 Shortly ago, her group sentenced the advisor to the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, who had been released after serving 35 years in jail, to imprisonment despite his advanced age on charges of violation of the "Security Law" for his possession of "literature benefiting enemy."
					
					 The Bar Association for Democratic Society was investigated by the puppet prosecution authorities for the mere reason that it played a crucial role in probing the truth about the spying cases in south Korea such as the case of the People's Revolutionary Party and the case of the National Democratic Youth and Students League cooked up during the Park Chung-hee military dictatorship and declaring those involved in them not guilty.
					
					 A Jonju parish priest of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice was subject to unbearable mistreatment and suppression for reading the mass demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye who was elected "president" through election-rigging.
					
					 Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, was put behind bars after being sentenced to heavy penalties for visiting Pyongyang to express condolences over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, a great loss to the nation. Members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy were detained on charges of advocating national reunification.
					
					 In March last year a representative of the civic organization was sentenced to 15 years in jail for making a knife attack on the U.S. ambassador to south Korea as an expression of his anger and protest against the U.S. standing in the way of Korea's reunification and staging madcap war rehearsals for invading the north. 
					
					 An increasing number of people in south Korea are arrested every year on charges of violation of the "Security Law" such as "praising and encouraging the north", "joining enemy benefiting organizations", "offering facility" and "hatching plots." 
					
					 Politically motivated investigation is conducted legally and openly in south Korea only under the pretext of "combating terrorism" and ensuring "security." 
					
					 According to data made public at the puppet National Assembly, the information investigation organs including the puppet Intelligence Service received 82 245 445 secret communication data without official warrants during the three years from 2012 to 2014. This means more than 75 000 data on a daily average and 1.6 cases of investigation into every person in three years.
					
					 Park Geun Hye forcibly banned Jaju Minbo, a progressive internet paper of south Korea.
					
					 During eight months of her office, she deleted more than 23 790 articles on websites on charge of violation of the "Security Law" and forcibly shut down hundreds of websites.
					
					 Park expelled an overseas Korean woman from south Korea on the charge of "praising and encouraging the social system in the north" for the mere reason that she uttered such words as "taste of the beer of the north is good and its rivers are very clean" while giving her impression of the DPRK as what she saw there. It was again Park who hatched all sorts of despicable plots by mobilizing the puppet Intelligence Service against a overseas compatriots organization for disclosing the truth behind the crimes related to the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 The Park group's operation for strangling democracy reached at its height in mercilessly suppressing the demonstrations and rallies of workers, farmers and other people from all walks of life in south Korea all out to protect their right to live from the puppet authorities' unpopular rule.
					
					 According to the official data released by the puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, those who were walked away at the venues of rallies and demos in Seoul in 2013 increased more 6.5 times over those in the previous year.
					
					 All the facts go to prove that Park is the ferocious fascist putting the preceding dictators into the shade.
					
					 Park can never escape a stern punishment for the thrice-cursed crimes she committed by turning south Korea into a huge prison, tundra of democracy and veritable hell of appalling confusion through her unprecedented fascist dictatorial rule after grabbing power through illegal methods, the white paper concluded.

articles.title: National Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Art Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) "The ever-victorious WPK" was opened with due ceremony at the Korean Art Gallery on Monday.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were art pieces depicting undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The art pieces reflect the struggle of the Korean people who have created miracles and feats for making the party congresses be recorded in the history of the WPK as glorious ones of victors.
					
					 Also displayed there were art pieces reflecting the joy of the people who greeted leaping Mallima era, the era of prosperity, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Several posters show the intention of the Korean service personnel and people to walk along the road of loyalty all the time under the WPK and accomplish the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned, creators in the field of art and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants looked round the art pieces.

articles.title: Production of Functional Paper Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Functional Paper Starts in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Paper Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK established a process of producing functional papers with an annual capacity of several hundreds tons.
					 The process makes it possible to produce various kinds of functional papers on the basis of indigenous technology and locally available raw materials.
					
					 Functional papers under production at the institute are small in needs but very diverse in kinds.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Land Management Campaign
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Land Management Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK have registered a number of achievements in the land management campaign for this year.
					 According to data available, hundreds of millions of trees were planted on mountains covering one hundred thousand hectares, roads extending over a hundred kilometers repaired and scores of bridges newly built across the country.
					
					 10 000 hectares of land were planted with various species of trees like Larix lepolepis and pine-nut tree in South Hamgyong and North and South Phyongan provinces respectively and 20 000 hectares of land in Jagang Province.
					
					 The same is true of other provinces.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province widened a road covering scores of kilometers, while Jagang and North Phyongan provinces finished projects of repairing and widening roads.
					
					 Meanwhile, hundreds of industrial establishments have updated facilities of collecting gas and dust from boilers and furnaces and small-and medium-sized coal mines in the Taedong River basin rebuilt their coal yards.

articles.title: Synthetic Grass Production Base Completed in DPRK
articles.content:
Synthetic Grass Production Base Completed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A synthetic grass production base was built at the Wonsan Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory in Kangwon Province of the DPRK.
					 The base can produce in a year hundreds of thousands square meters of synthetic grass of which technical indices meet international standards.
					
					 The completion of the base is closely associated with the sincere support rendered by scientists from the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science under the State Academy of Sciences and the provincial science and technology commission.

articles.title: Mt. Paektu Tells about Feats of Kim Il Sung for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Mt. Paektu Tells about Feats of Kim Il Sung for Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Mt. Paektu in the DPRK tells about the history of revolutionary activities conducted by President Kim Il Sung to liberate the country from the Japanese imperialist aggressors through armed struggle.
					 In the period of anti-Japanese armed struggle, he had waged victorious guerrilla warfare in the areas around the mountain with ever-changing tactics, winning fame as "General of Mt. Paektu" and "Tiger of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 Legends about him were told among Koreans whenever the Kim Il Sung-led guerrilla army won battles against the Japanese aggression troops. Typical of those many legends is a story that "General Kim Il Sung knows the providence of the universe". 
					
					 Meanwhile, inhabitants composed popular songs in high praise of him such as "The General Star over Mt. Paektu", calling him the "Savior of the fellow countrymen with the spirit of Mt. Paektu" or "Heaven-born saint bringing all blessings to the people".
					
					 Also, guerrillas and inhabitants wrote on many trees such slogans showing their indomitable will to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the great leader of the Korean nation. They include "General Kim Il Sung is the sun of all people" and "We will always follow General Kim Il Sung as our great leader".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 which started early in March closed.
					 The largest-ever joint military drills were nuclear war exercises which the enemies conducted after throwing away such disguise as "annual and defensive drills", Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The enemies made the provoking of a nuclear war against the north an established fact and staged the drills with the purpose of an actual war. Herein lies the grave danger of the drills.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists cooked up a new "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the UN while taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes on the eve of the joint military drills to extremely escalate the moves for "isolating" and "blockading" it.
					
					 The way of a war of aggression in the new century optioned by the U.S. imperialists is to launch a war with the main stress on surprise air-strike and "strike for disabling armed forces".
					
					 The joint military drills fully prove that the U.S. and south Korean insanity for a nuclear war against the DPRK has gone beyond the limit to reach the zenith of danger and that they have rounded off full preparations and only watched for a chance to ignite a war.
					
					 Their frantic war drills helped the DPRK understand clearly once again that it was just when it decided to bolster up national defence capabilities with self-defensive nuclear deterrence as its pivot.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns Japanese Reactionaries' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns Japanese Reactionaries' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Some days ago Japanese Prime Minister Abe and other ultra-rightist reactionaries made ritual offerings to Yasukuni Shrine. Dozens of dietmen swarmed to Yasukuni Shrine later.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Monday says that it is anachronistic hysteria that Japan is calling back the departed soul of militarism, turning a blind eye to the changed times.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japanese reactionaries' frequent visits to the shrine are a serious political issue which draws strong protest and condemnation from many Asian countries such as Korea which once suffered from the Japanese imperialists' war of aggression against the continent.
					
					 If Japan is truly serious about its bright future, it should make a resolute decision to break with its past, not forgetting the bitter lesson it drew from the defeat it sustained while running wild to realize the wild dream of "the Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries are foolishly resorting  to the moves to revive militarism, calculating that their way out lies in overseas invasion, still defying the changed times.
					
					 In a word, Japan is making a desperate bid to repeat its disgraceful past, far from seeking a wide avenue for future.
					
					 Japan should look out to the world with its eyes wide open. 
					
					 Prosperity of a country and a nation cannot be achieved by invading and plundering other country and nation.
					
					 Japan should properly face up to the world, drawing a lesson from its past history of defeat, and stop at once its foolish acts of calling back the departed soul of militarism.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures Park Geun Hye for Pursuing Policies, Bogged down in Ditch
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures Park Geun Hye for Pursuing Policies, Bogged down in Ditch
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, the nation's trouble maker, keeps pursuing disgusting policies, bogged down in a ditch.
					 Grudge is running high against traitor Park Geun Hye who totally failed in politics and economy and brought the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. Against this background she recently brought together human scum as part of the charade to maintain the regime, bringing to light her despicable and disgusting true colors to make matters worse.
					
					 Of late south Korean media disclosed that Chongwadae instructed the "Oboi Yonhap", notorious ultra-rightist conservative body, through the executive officer of its office of the chief secretary for political affairs, to hold a meeting supporting the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army early this year and let the "National Businessmen's Association" (Jongyongryon), the group of plutocrats, and other organization to provide funds to the above-said body.
					
					 It was said that the amount of the funds the "Oboi Yonhap" received from Jongyongryon in the name of "operation fund" from September to November, 2014 reached 120 million won.
					
					 This is a true story about her foul politics.
					
					Park's affection for the "Oboi Yonhap" deserves an ill-fame.
					
					 She is apt to call this ultra-rightist conservative group each time she makes a trouble as she finds it perfectly suited to her treacherous and unpopular political motive.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group struck a "deal" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army at the talks with the Japanese foreign minister in Seoul late last year. This sparked off criticism among Koreans and other people of the world for being the "second south Korea-Japan treaty." 
					
					 At the talks Japan, in fact, denied the responsibility for its past crimes and evaded the reparation for them by uttering the ambiguous word of "apology" and making the promise to offer a petty amount of financial aid while the south Korean traitors overlooked Japan's distortion of history and promised to remove the statue of a girl sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army standing in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul and stop the accusation against Japan in international arenas, thrice-cursed acts of treachery.
					
					 The "agreement" made between the south Korean regime and the Japanese reactionaries was the height of the former's sycophancy towards Japan and craftiness and shamelessness peculiar to Japan.
					
					 When rallies and demonstrations demanding the total nullification of the criminal "agreement" took place in south Korea almost every day and the public became ever more vocal critical of it, the Park group gave an instruction to the "Oboi Yonhap" to hold a rally in support of the "agreement" and let the plutocrats give it a generous reward for the event. 
					
					 Chongwadae has hurled a group of human scum into the operations for eliminating the public figures with different political views from it.
					
					 In January last year ultra-rightist conservative elements affiliated to the "Oboi Yonhap" thronged to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office and demanded it impose a heavy penalty on Ri Sok Gi, lawmaker from the former Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 It was none other than the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who prodded the old members of the "Oboi Yonhap" and "the Society of Victims of Defoliants" and other ultra-rightist conservative gangsters into staging a "rally denouncing the followers of the north" in the heart of Seoul and conducting the operations for scattering leaflets against the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Park group has been behind those who have zealously backed the conservative forces in their hysteric counteractions against the anti-"government" struggles of people of various circles in south Korea.
					
					 Park is a poor political charlatan keen on the trite political campaign by relying on the ultra-right maniacs forsaken by the public.
					
					 Her fate has already been sealed in the political landscape in south Korea becoming ever more corrupt with each passing day.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Caught in Crisis: S. Korean Newsis
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Caught in Crisis: S. Korean Newsis
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Newsis in an article on April 28 derided the Park Geun Hye regime caught in the worst crisis after being forsaken by people.
					 Noting the Chongwadae's plight is deplorable as the ruling party was fallen into a chaos in the wake of its defeat in the general election and the opposition camp remains averse to the flagship policies of the regime, the article noted, adding:
					
					 Park at a meet-the press on April 26 reconfirmed the regime's plan to push forward the "system of introducing state-compiled history textbooks" and expressed opposition to the moves to amend the special law for the ferry Sewol.
					
					 Opposition parties are rejecting the far-fetched assertion of Park and threatening to immediately opt for scrapping the above-said plan and amending the law.
					
					 But the ruling party is in storm in a teacup.
					
					Increasing is public concern over the rule of Park.

articles.title: Chun Doo Hwan Denounced for Denying Responsibility for Massacre in Kwangju
articles.content:
Chun Doo Hwan Denounced for Denying Responsibility for Massacre in Kwangju
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Cruel murderer and fascist Chun Doo Hwan is totally denying the responsibility for the massacre in Kwangju, sparking off surging indignation among south Koreans from all walks of life.
					 A close lackey of Chun Doo Hwan when interviewed by Yonhap News on April 21 said the May 18 incident is widely known wrong as Chun Doo Hwan was not holding a post of the commanding system and was not directly involved in declaration of the "martial law" because he was just the security commander at that time.
					
					 This stunning news triggered off denunciation from public bodies and personages related to the May 18 incident and other south Koreans.
					
					 The chairman of the Society of Those Wounded for the May 18 Movement for Democracy, the chairman of the May 18 Council of Bereaved Families of Men of Merits for Democracy and the permanent councilor of the Foundation for Commemorating May 18 Incident denounced Chun Doo Hwan, saying that it is a historical fact he engineered a rebellion to grab power and murdered many people.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Fanning up Confrontation with North
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities for Fanning up Confrontation with North
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given under the sponsorship of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on April 29 denouncing the puppet chief executive of south Korea for escalating north-south stand-off and tensions, according to south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo.
					 Ri Chon Jae, adviser of the South Side Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, said the largest-ever nuclear war exercises that have been lasted for nearly two months with the involvement of hundreds of thousands of troops were a crime indicative of the U.S. ambition for hegemony.
					
					 Obama made confession that "a nuclear war cannot be fought on the Korean peninsula now" not because of the safety of the south Korean people but because of the north's nuclear capabilities, he said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. conclusion that a nuclear war can not be fought on the peninsula just stemmed from the present situation.
					
					 But the chief executive still keeps pursuing south-north confrontation and war moves, turning her face away from the trend of the times.
					
					 The driving force that can give spurs to change is ourselves, he said, stressing the need for all the people to have confidence that they are the masters of the times.
					
					 At the end of the lecture, there was a demonstration march to the "government" building.

articles.title: Young Koreans in Japan Meet
articles.content:
Young Koreans in Japan Meet
 Tokyo, April 30 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of Korean youth and students in Japan in Tokyo on April 28 to open a new era of independent reunification under the sponsorship of the Youth and Students Council of the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Japanese Regional Committee, said that the heavy defeat of the "Saenuri Party" at the recent "National Assembly" election in south Korea is an expression of the will of the youth and students in the south side to reopen the June 15 era and achieve independent reunification.
					
					 Speakers expressed their will to arouse the youth and students overseas to the reunification movement, saying that the youth and students of the new generation should take the lead in the struggle to put an end to the division of the nation and reunify the country.
					
					 An action programme of the Youth and Students Council was announced at the meeting.
					
					 The meeting adopted an appeal to the youth and students in the north, the south and abroad.

articles.title: Japan's Government Accused of Discriminating against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japan's Government Accused of Discriminating against Korean Schools
 Tokyo, April 30 (KNS-KCNA) -- Hyogo prefectural meeting took place in Kobe City on April 23 under the co-sponsorship of the Korean school in Hyogo and the Hyogo Prefectural People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship to demand the instant withdrawal of the notice of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology on suspending payment of subsidies to the Korean schools.
					 Present at the meeting were teachers, compatriots, students' parents and Japanese citizens.
					
					 The speakers censured the Japanese government's unreasonable measure towards the Korean schools, saying that it was discrimination against national education.
					
					 They showed their determination to stage protest in unison to ensure the rights of the Korean schools in Japan such as applying the tuition-free program for senior high schools to the Koreans schools.
					
					 A letter of protest to the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on April 25 in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road of developing the party into his eternal party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted by German Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted by German Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's works "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" and "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" were posted by the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture on its website on April 26 in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The first work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the WPK is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the party is always sure to triumph.
					
					 The second work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is the proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Hail DPRK's Big Success in Test-fire of SLBM
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Hail DPRK's Big Success in Test-fire of SLBM
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on April 24 congratulating Juche Korea on achieving the big success in the test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile again.
					 The statement said supreme leader Kim Jong Un guided the said test-fire on the spot.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK came into the possession of another powerful nuclear attack means.
					
					 The big success of the test-fire serves as a great victory of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 And it is a proud present of the DPRK's scientists and technicians in the field of national defence extending to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 As regards the big success in the test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile, we extend warm congratulations to the Marshal, the WPK, the DPRK government, the KPA and the Korean people.

articles.title: British Organization Congratulates Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
British Organization Congratulates Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The British preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on April 25 to congratulate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is of great significance for the development of the WPK and the Korean revolution that the WPK Seventh Congress would be held in the period when an epochal change is being made in carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution under the wise leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK Seventh Congress will serve as a historical landmark in hastening a final victory for the cause of the Juche revolution by further strengthening the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and raising its leadership role.
					
					 The Congress will successfully review the immortal exploits performed by the WPK under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and set forth a strategic great programme for a great surge in building a thriving nation as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					 The WPK is a vanguard unit for the socialist cause and revolutionary party advancing under the unfurled banner of Juche and Songun.
					
					 The WPK Seventh Congress will become a congress of victors.

articles.title: Russian Website Introduces Mt. Chilbo, Famous Mountain of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Website Introduces Mt. Chilbo, Famous Mountain of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Online news agency Vlad News of Russia posted an article and photos introducing the area of Mt. Chilbo in the DPRK on April 27.
					 The article titled "The area of Mt. Chilbo, the world biosphere sanctuary" said:
					
					 Mt. Chilbo on the east coast of Korea is one of six famous mountains in Korea for its kaleidoscopic views.
					
					 The area was registered as a world biosphere sanctuary in 2014 and it covers 250 square kilometers and it is very big value to protect it.
					
					 More than 40 percent of the species of the country's animals and birds inhabit in the mountain favorable in terms of geographical location and rich in food.
					
					 Not a few historical remains and relics showcasing the long history of the Korean nation have been discovered to be preserved in this area.
					
					 Rich animals and plants and specialties in the area of big economic significance are greatly conducive to improving the living standard of the inhabitants in the area.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "The Only Way to National Reunification Is the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its website One Corea Network on April 24.
					 The work was announced on April 10, Juche 82 (1993).

articles.title: CRPP revela crimenes de horda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP revela crimenes de horda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 2 una carta blanca revelando la connotada represion fascista cometida por la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye durante su  mandato.
					La nota pone al desnudo que Park se desespero para sepultar politicamente el Partido Progresista Unido, que presento como su programa la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, calificandolo de "organizacion pro-Norte e inconstitucional", y prosigue:
					
					Al no poder realizar su meta debido a las censuras internas y externas, ella invento el incidente intrigante de rebelion y asi descompuso a fuerza en diciembre de 2014 ese partido que vino desplegando sus actividades juridicas durante 15 anos.
					
					Insatisfecha con reprimir al Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes constituido en 1989 calificandolo de "corazon de fuerzas pro-Norte" y "enemigo interno", lo convirtio al fin y al cabo en un sindicato extrajudicial poniendole la gorra de "entidad pro-enemiga".
					
					Movilizo a los gangsteres titeres a ejecutar a plena luz una pesquisa ilegal sobre la oficina y las casas de los miembros de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria. Detuvo forzosamente a un miembro medular que sufria una enfermedad incurable y arresto al subsecretario general de susodicha alianza imponiendole el  sufrimiento espiritual y fisico de toda indole.
					
					Hace poco, sentencio la condena a encarcelamiento al asesor de edad avanzada de la direccion surena de la APRP, que fue excarcelando al cabo de 35 anos de prision, imputandole la sospecha de que el violo la "ley de seguridad" al tener los "materiales de caracter pro-enemigo".
					
					La Union de Abogados por una Sociedad Democratica fue sometida a la investigacion de la fiscalia titere surcoreana por haber revelado los verdaderos aspectos de varios casos de los grupos de espias incluso el de Partido Revolucionario Popular y el de Confederacion Nacional de los Jovenes y Estudiantes Democraticos, que fueron inventados en la epoca del "Poder" de dictadura militar de Park Chung Hee, y cumplido los papeles decisivos en declarar la inculpabilidad a los acusados.
					
					Tambien, un sacerdote de Jonju perteneciente al Cuerpo Nacional de Sacerdotes Catolicos por la Realizacion de la Justicia quien hizo la misa de situacion exigiendo la retirada de Park Geun-hye, elegida como "presidenta" mediante las elecciones ilegales, se vio obligado a sufrir los maltratos y represion de toda indole.
					
					Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) quien visito a Pyongyang para expresar las condolencias por el duelo nacional, fue condenado con una pena severa y vive encarcelado bajo toda clase de represiones y sufrimientos y los miembros de la Solidaridad por la Reunificacion Independiente y la Democracia del Sur de Corea fueron detenidos por la razon de haber insistido en la reunificacion.
					
					Fue condenado a 15 anos de prision un representante de una entidad civil quien en marzo del ano pasado dio sablazo justo al embajador norteamericano en Sur de Corea en expresion de la ira y protesta contra Estados Unidos que impide la reunificacion de la nacion coreana y se aferra a la provocacion de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					En la actualidad en el Sur de Corea se aumenta anualmente el numero de los habitantes detenidos bajo la sospecha de violacion de la "ley de seguridad" de diversas formas tales como "elogio y estimulo al Norte", "constitucion de las entidades pro-enemigas e ingreso en ellas", "oferta de comodidad", "conspiracion preliminar", etc.
					
					Solo en el Sur de Corea se comete abiertamente la inspeccion politica bajo el rotulo de la "prevencion de terror" y la "seguridad".
					
					Segun datos publicados por la Asamblea Nacional surcoreana, el numero de los datos secretos de comunicaciones que durante 3 anos desde 2012 hasta 2014, el Servicio de Inteligencia y otros organos de inteligencia y pesquisa recibieron sin orden oficial, llega a 82 millones 245 mil 445. Esta cifra significa que el numero promedio al dia es mas de 75 mil y durante 3 anos cada uno recibio en 1.6 veces la inspeccion.
					
					Park suspendio coercitivamente la publicacion del progresivo periodico online surcoreano Jaju Minbo.
					
					Durante 8 meses despues de la toma del poder, ella elimino en el sitio web de Internet mas de 23 mil 790 articulos en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" y cerro a fuerza centenares de sitios Web.
					
					Impulso a fuerza del Sur de Corea a una mujer residente en ultramar en virtud del "crimen de elogio y estimulo al regimen del Norte de Corea", quien expreso su sincera impresion de la visita a la RPDC diciendo que "es delicioso el sabor de la cerveza del Norte y es muy limpio el rio del Norte". En tanto, movilizando al Servicio de Inteligencia titere perpetro viles maniobras de toda indole contra una entidad de coreanos en ultramar, que revelo y critico el verdadero aspecto criminal sobre la tragedia del ferry "Sewol".
					
					La atrocidad de ahorcamiento de la democracia de la banda de Park llego al extremo al reprimir sin piedad la manifestacion y el mitin de los obreros, campesinos y otras capas del Sur de Corea que acudieron a la calle contra la politica antipopular de las autoridades y por defender los derechos de vida.
					
					Segun los datos oficiales de la Jefatura de Policia Regional de Seul, el numero de las personas detenidas en 2013 en los lugares de mitines y manifestaciones realizadas en Seul se aumento en 6.5 veces mas en comparacion con el ano anterior.
					
					Los hechos arriba mencionados muestran claramente que Park es la malvada fascista que supera mucho mas a los anteriores dictadores surcoreanos.
					
					Seran sentenciados duramente sin falta los crimenes sin precedentes cometidos por Park que usurpo de manera ilegal el Poder y realizo la gobernacion dictatorial fascista convirtiendo el suelo surcoreano en una gran prision sin rejas, tundra de democracia e infierno de pandemonium

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Terminaron los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle 16" iniciados al principio de marzo por Estados Unidos y la banda titere del Sur de Corea.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun transmitio el dia 2 un comentario individual denunciandolos como simulacros de guerra nuclear cometidos abiertamente por los enemigos quitando hasta las mascaras "anual" y "defensiva".
					
					El presente entrenamiento militar conjunto se realizo imaginando la guerra real con el fin de provocar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC. He aqui la peligrosidad severa de los recientes ejercicios militares conjuntos, subraya el diario y continua:
					
					En visperas de esos ejercicios militares, EE.UU. elevo al maximo el grado de "aislamiento" y "bloqueo" anti-RPDC al inventar nueva "resolucion de sancion" en la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC con fines pacificos.
					
					El modo de guerra agresiva de nuevo siglo optado por el imperio norteamericano es el ataque aereo inesperado y "el golpe para incapacitacion". 
					
					"Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle 16" muestran patentemente que la locura anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea supero su limite y llego a la fase extremadamente peligrosa y que estos ya habian terminado todos sus preparativos y buscaban con ansiedad la oportunidad para encender la mecha de guerra.
					
					Tales maniobras belicas de los enemigos nos hacen experimentar la justeza de nuestras medidas tomadas para fortalecer por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional basada en el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza visita al santuario Yasukuni de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza visita al santuario Yasukuni de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el premier Abe y otros reaccionarios ultraderechistas japoneses entregaron ofrendas al santuario Yasukuni, mientras decenas de  parlamentarios lo visitaron en colectivo.
					En un comentario individual de este lunes, el periodico Minju Joson lo califica de proceder anacronico e histerico encaminado a resucitar el fantasma militarista dando vistas gordas al cambio de la epoca, y continua:
					
					La frecuente visita al santuario Yasukuni de los reaccionarios japoneses deviene un agudo problema politico que provoca fuerte repudio y rechazo de muchos paises asiaticos incluso Corea que en el tiempo pasado sufrieron los martirios por la agresion continental de los imperialistas japoneses. 
					
					Si Japon desea de veras el radiante futuro de su pais, debe romper con el pasado sin olvidar su amarga derrota sufrida en la segunda guerra mundial por haber abrigado la ilusion de "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses actuan con absurdidad para resucitar el militarismo considerando que la agresion a ultramar es la via para la subsistencia de si mismos dando espaldas al cambio de la epoca. 
					
					En otra palabra, Japon se desespera por regresar hacia el pasado vergonzoso en vez de avanzar hacia el futuro radiante. 
					
					La prosperidad de un pais y nacion no se logra por la agresion y saqueo a otros paises y naciones.
					
					Japon debe sacar la leccion de su historia de derrota y dejar el intento absurdo de resucitar el fantasma militarista.

articles.title: ACNC califica a Park Geun-hye de miserable buhonera de politica basurienta
articles.content:
ACNC califica a Park Geun-hye de miserable buhonera de politica basurienta
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Park Geun-hye, fuente de calamidades nacionales, sigue apestando con la politica corrupta.
					Ahora cuando los habitantes surcoreanos expresan el gran rencor a la traidora Park Geun-hye quien llevo al fracaso la politica y la economia y rompio totalmente las relaciones con el Norte, fue revelado hace unos dias el acto vergonzoso y asqueroso de ella quien movilizo hasta las escorias humanas para mantener su "Poder".
					
					 Recientemente, los medios de prensa del Sur de Corea desenmascararon el hecho de que a principios de este ano, Chongwadae dio, por conducto del oficial ejecutivo de la oficina de jefes para asuntos politicos, la orden de organizar el mitin en apoyo al humillante "acuerdo" del problema de esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones a la "Oboi Yonhap", entidad ultraderechista de mala fama e hizo que la "Federacion Nacional de Empresarios" (Jongyongryon), grupo de las empresas plutocratas, y otra entidad "Kyonguhoe" le ofrecieran el fondo a esa entidad ultraderechista.
					
					 Dijeron que el dinero, que este colectivo de escorias recibio desde Jongyongryon y uso bajo el pretexto de los "gastos de gestion", llego a 120 millones de wones solo desde septiembre hasta noviembre de 2014.
					
					 Esto es el miserable comercio de politica basurienta.
					
					  Esta conocido ampliamente el hecho de que Park Geun-hye usaba con predileccion "Oboi Yonhap", grupo de escorias humanas viejas.
					
					 Cada vez que se necesita, Park Geun-hye solia llamar esta entidad ultraderechista que se conviene a su gusto politico antinacional y anti-popular.
					
					 A fines de 2015, Japon y el Sur de Corea desarrollaron en Seul las conversaciones de ministros diplomaticos en que "acordaron" la solucion del problema de esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones, lo cual produjo la condenacion de los coreanos y el mundo calificandose del "segundo Acuerdo Sur Corea-Japon".
					
					  En la ocasion Japon nego sus crimenes del pasado y evadio la liquidacion solo con la "disculpa" hipocrita y el ofrecimiento del fondo de bagatela.
					
					  Por otra parte, la banda traidora del Sur de Corea perpetro el imperdonable acto vendepatria de tolerar el acto antihistorico de Japon y prometer el traslado de la estatua de nina esclava sexual levantada ante la embajada japonesa en Seul y el cese de la censura en la escena internacional.
					
					  En todas partes del Sur de Corea se desarrollaron casi todos los dias los mitines y manifestaciones de protesta en demanda de la nulidad total de ese "acuerdo" criminal, extremidad de la naturaleza projapones y el servilismo a las grandes potencias de las banda traidora surcoreana y del peculiar caracter astuto y descaro de Japon, y se elevaron las voces de censura al respecto.
					
					  Atemorizada ante esta situacion, la pandilla de Park Geun-hye dio a "Oboi Yonhap" la orden de organizar el mitin en apoyo al "acuerdo" e hizo que las empresas plutocraticas le pagaran suficientemente el precio.
					
					  Tambien, ella ha usado este colectivo de escorias humanas tambien en los trabajos para eliminar a las personalidades de distintos estratos que tienen el criterio politico diferente de si misma.
					
					  Instigo a los conservadores ultraderechistas pertenecientes a la entidad en cuestion a hacer alborotos en enero de 2015 ante la Fiscalia de Seul exigiendo sentenciar con una pena severa a Ri Sok Gi, miembro de la "Asamblea Nacional" del ex Partido Progresista Unido.
					
					  Ademas, hizo que los vejetes de esa entidad y los gangsteres ultraderechistas de la "Asociacion de Victimas de Defoliante" y otros grupos conservadores realizaran en Seul el mitin como el "congreso nacional para denunciar a las fuerzas pro-Norte" y desarrollaran la farsa del lanzamiento de volantes contra los compatriotas norcoreanos.
					
					  Como muestran los hechos arriba mencionados la banda de Park es el autor que fomento e instigo por detras la locura frenetica de la pandilla conservadora cometida hasta la fecha contra la lucha anti-gubernamental de distintos estratos en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Es miserable la situacion de la politiquera Park Geun-hye quien se entrega a la vieja campana politica apoyandose en los maniacos ultraderechistas abandonados por todo el mundo. 
					
					  ?Cuanto tiempo se mantendria la vida restante de la buhonera de politica basurienta bajo la situacion politica del Sur de Corea que se hace mas corrupta con el paso de los dias?
